body_html:
Also, We are very close to moving windows to bazel, so we will lower the amount of support we will have available for cmake once that happens.
Therefore, I recommend using bazel instead for distributing TF.
body_text:

Therefore, I recommend using bazel instead for distributing TF.
body:
Also, We are very close to moving windows to bazel, so we will lower the amount of support we will have available for cmake once that happens.
Therefore, I recommend using bazel instead for distributing TF.
